content: Most of these consumables can also be crafted from the Shrine once you reach the Shen Monkey Vendor in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain and the end of Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge and meet Xu Dog. Our walkthrough has a full breakdown of each of those areas.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Consumable_Items.md', within the main section titled 'Consumable Items'.
The content is as follows:
Most of these consumables can also be crafted from the Shrine once you reach the Shen Monkey Vendor in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain and the end of Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge and meet Xu Dog. Our walkthrough has a full breakdown of each of those areas.
